creditline: Gift of Adrienne H. and Robert J. White
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Knife with pointed bulbous blade; wood handle with indented square design and brass tacks; sheath made of wood covered with hide; decorated with X's. Arms and Armor-Edged Weapon
markings: [L], on woven tape, at top of blade
medium: Iron, wood, animal hide, cane, brass tacks
title: Short Sword and Sheath
